name: valentines-vr
description: A small heart-collecting game live-coded during [IoT Makers Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/IoT-Makers-Israel/events/257266871/) using [A-Frame](https://aframe.io).  Deployed on [Microsoft Azure cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/free/?WT.mc_id=devto-blog-adpolak).
